backend/main.mo: Main actor defining category, worker, and inquiry types with storage maps, admin auth helper, and mixins for authorization and blob storage.
backend/migration.mo: No-op migration module providing a run function that returns an empty new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like list summarizing all frontend files and their responsibilities for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS layer definitions with theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes for all pages and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/Categories: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting categories with dialogs and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiriesA: Admin panel listing inquiries with filtering, status updates, and deletion handling with error and loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/WorkersAdm: Admin interface for viewing, filtering, approving, rejecting, and removing worker accounts with error and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading state and automatic session clearing.
frontend/src/components/Brand.tsx: Simple component rendering the SevaSangam brand name in three languages.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Grid of category cards linking to category pages with spriteâ€‘based icons.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAd: Guard component that checks admin session and redirects unauthorized users to the admin login page.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAu: Guard requiring Internet Identity login before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Basic app layout wrapper including header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Simple footer displaying a copyright-style message.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, mobile menu, worker/admin auth logic, and login/logout actions.
frontend/src/components/search/HomeSearc: Search form for category, location, and availability that navigates to the worker search page with parameters.
frontend/src/components/workers/PhotoPic: Component for uploading, previewing, and removing a worker profile photo using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCa: Displays a worker's brief profile card with photo, experience, location, and a link to their full profile.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCo: Provides call and WhatsApp action buttons for contacting a worker using generated links.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerPr: Form for editing an existing worker profile, handling major field changes, photo updates, and re-approval warnings.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerRe: Form for creating a new worker profile, collecting personal, contact, category, and availability details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin login state using stored credentials and validates access through backend admin-only calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Aggregates worker and admin authentication state for authorization checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login logic, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, categories, workers, and admin-protected actions using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background and text styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for managing workers, categories, and inquiries, including logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Implements the admin login form with validation, actor readiness checks, and redirect on successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesIndexPage.t: Displays a header and grid of service categories via CategoryCardGrid.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Shows workers for a specific category with loading, error, and empty states using useGetWorkersByCategory.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero content, search panel, and category browsing sections.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Filters all workers based on query parameters and displays search results with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerDashboardPage.t: Worker dashboard showing profile status, editing UI, and registration prompt if no profile exists.
Handles worker onboarding flow including identity login, user profile setup, and worker registration submission.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerProfilePage.tsx: Public worker profile view displaying details like photo, category, experience, location, and contact actions.
frontend/src/utils/adminApiErrorHandling: Utilities to detect admin API errors, map them to messages, clear sessions, and optionally redirect on unauthorized access.
frontend/src/utils/adminSessionStorage.t: Provides helpers to save, retrieve, clear, and validate stored admin session info in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/categories.ts: Defines category IDs, human-readable names, and a mapping to numeric icons for worker categories.
frontend/src/utils/contactLinks.ts: Creates telephone and WhatsApp links by normalizing phone numbers and encoding optional messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with session storage support and hash routing handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom color tokens, container settings, fonts, shadows, and animation keyframes using multiple plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project state metadata, feature requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for the SevaSangam build, marking the file as a fix request.
